title: Ideas
body:
Ideas for...
***League of Legends client:**
-Overall
Demotion series
-Friends list / Friends tab
More synchronized time when friends are playing games
A symbol/icon or name that shows people if they are duoing
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
***In-game:**
Summoner ranks beside or with the scoreboard (tab thingy)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
